mapper.select: SELECT c.id AS c_id , c.u_id , u.nickname , c.title AS c_title , c.content , c.cdate , c.cl_id , cl.title AS cl_title , cl.p_id , p.title p_title , p.t_id , t.name AS t_name , f.cnt_f_cid , r.cnt_r_cid FROM linker.card AS c LEFT JOIN ( SELECT * from linker.card AS a1 JOIN( SELECT c_id ,count(c_id) AS cnt_f_cid FROM linker.c_file AS f GROUP BY c_id ) AS f ON a1.id=f.c_id ) AS f ON c.id = f.c_id LEFT JOIN ( SELECT * FROM linker.card AS c LEFT JOIN( SELECT c_id , count(c_id) AS cnt_r_cid FROM linker.c_reply AS r GROUP BY r.c_id ) AS r ON c.id = r.c_id ) AS r ON c.id = r.c_id JOIN linker.cardlist AS cl ON cl.id = c.cl_id JOIN linker.project AS p ON cl.p_id = p.id JOIN ( SELECT thu.t_id , t.name , t.id FROM linker.team_has_user AS thu LEFT JOIN linker.team AS t ON t.id = thu.t_id WHERE u_id = #{u_id} AND t.status = 0 ) AS t ON t.id = p.t_id JOIN linker.user AS u ON c.u_id = u.id WHERE c.ps_id = 1 AND ( c.title LIKE CONCAT ('%', #{keyword}, '%') OR c.content LIKE CONCAT ('%', #{keyword}, '%') ) ORDER BY c.cdate DESC

SELECT c.id , c.u_id , c.title , c.content , c.cdate , c.udate , c.cl_id , c.ps_id , cl.p_id FROM linker.card AS c JOIN linker.cardlist AS cl ON cl.id = c.cl_id WHERE cl.p_id=#{p_id} AND c.ps_id = 2 AND ( c.title LIKE CONCAT ('%', #{keyword}, '%') OR c.content LIKE CONCAT ('%', #{keyword}, '%') ) ORDER BY c.cdate DESC

SELECT c.id , c.u_id , c.title , c.content , c.cdate , c.udate , c.cl_id , c.ps_id , cl.p_id FROM linker.card AS c JOIN linker.cardlist AS cl ON cl.id = c.cl_id WHERE cl.p_id=#{p_id} AND c.ps_id = 3 AND ( c.title LIKE CONCAT ('%', #{keyword}, '%') ) ORDER BY c.cdate DESC
SELECT id , p_id , u_id , title , ps_id , udate FROM linker.cardlist WHERE p_id = #{p_id} AND ps_id = 2 AND title LIKE CONCAT ('%',#{keyword}, '%') ORDER BY udate DESC
SELECT id , p_id , u_id , title , ps_id , udate FROM linker.cardlist WHERE p_id = #{p_id} AND ps_id = 3 AND ( title LIKE CONCAT ('%', #{keyword}, '%') ) ORDER BY udate DESC

SELECT thu.t_id , thu.auth , t.name , thu.status , t.cdate FROM linker.user AS u JOIN linker.team_has_user AS thu ON u.id=thu.u_id JOIN linker.team AS t ON thu.t_id = t.id WHERE thu.status = 1 AND t.status=0 AND thu.t_id IN ( SELECT thu.t_id FROM linker.team_has_user AS thu WHERE thu.u_id=#{u_id} ) AND u.nickname LIKE CONCAT('%', #{keyword} , '%') GROUP BY thu.t_id ORDER BY t.name DESC
